poem:
Title: "Metered Freedom"

Of gas we speak, and of this creeping
Tide that measures usage, keeping
Count of every flicker, flame;
Power in numbers, in name. 

Chris dreams of streets, all meter-bound,
In digital reading, freedom drowned.
But our four million silent fight,
In their blank screens feign compliance, ignite. 

Is this our path? Strong-armed by power,
To see each hearthstone hour by hour.
